projectName: Tacoma World Build Threads - Resume After Auth
preRequisites: Manually log in if prompted (XenForo forum account required)
Let stealth_scraper complete URL discovery across all 158 pages

userStories.title: Verify URL discovery after auth bypass
Scrape HTML for all thread URLs
acceptanceCriteria: Download HTML for all ~7,854 thread pages
userStories.notes: Use 2s delay between requests, checkpoint every 100 URLs

userStories.title: Extract build data from threads
userStories.notes: XenForo uses .message-body for post content, .bbImage for images

userStories.title: Extract and categorize modifications
acceptanceCriteria: Parse modification lists from build threads
Generate mods.json with categories and confidence scores
userStories.notes: Tacoma mods: suspension lifts, bumpers, racks, lighting, armor

userStories.title: Complete and verify pipeline
userStories.notes: Expected: ~7,854 builds, significant mod count for Toyota Tacoma community
